name: The Shirt of Scars
description:
- WASD / arrow keys to move.

- I / Left Mouse Button / Left Control to Swing Sword.

- J to use Berserk Charge (4 health or less).

- K to use Shell of Courage (2 health or less).

- L to fire a Torrent of Flame (1 health).

- P to Pause and review instructions.

You are a young warrior seeking to prove himself by scaling Fool Mountain. You have many special abilities, but they are locked until you take damage! 

Created in 72 hours for Mini Jam #96.  Theme: Fate. Limitation: Losing is good.

https://itch.io/jam/mini-jam-96-fate

Design, Art, & Code: Alexander Kazazis. Music from John Leonard French's Ultimate Game Music Collection (via Unity Asset Store).
